reviews.review_text:
I recently visited this restaurant and had a pleasant experience overall. The food was good, with flavors that satisfied the palate. However, the sizzler portion was not enough and left me wanting more. On the bright side, the watermelon juice was refreshing and perfectly balanced.

The ambience and decor deserve a special mention – they were exceptional and added a lot to the dining experience. The pricing was decent, making it an affordable spot for a good meal.

In conclusion, it’s a place worth visiting, especially for the great atmosphere and reasonable prices. Just make sure to order enough if you're craving sizzlers!

We went for a very late lunch, but they were happy to accommodate us. Few of the dishes weren't available as it was nearing their closing time. The Special Goan Thali felt authentic. They didn't have crabs available so they were ready to swap it with prawns or King fish in the Thali.

Veg menu items were also delicious and the quantity was good. Spent nearly 400-500 PP excl. drinks.

If you're in Calangute, Goa, and looking for a place with great food and an awesome vibe, De Little Goa is worth a visit. The ambiance is cozy and welcoming, making it a perfect spot to sit, relax, and enjoy your meal.

The food here is delightful, with flavors that truly capture the essence of Goa. Whether you're dining solo, with friends, or family, the experience is sure to leave you satisfied. It's an ideal spot if you're looking for a better dining experience and a great place to unwind.

Highly recommended for anyone visiting Calangute!
